dc:title: On Pilgrimage - October/November 1978
dc:creator: Dorothy Day
dc:description: Snippets expanded from her diary: recollection of early Russian friends, visitors, the death of Pope John Paul I and election of John Paul II, books, and operas. Says sex is fundamental but religion transfigures it.
